alert.note: Alert for Madison; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 12:18AM CDT until June 15 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1218 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Little Yazoo, or 11 miles southeast of Yazoo City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Way and Vaughan around 1240 AM CDT. Sharon around 1250 AM CDT. Camden around 1255 AM CDT. Farmhaven around 100 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
